featured.text: The donkey was so much weighed down by the wet sand that he could hardly get out of the stream.
They found that during the dry season about half of the snakes accepted fresh water offered to them, while nearly none did during the wet season.
When the donkey jumped into the stream and got the sacks wet, they became much ___(39)___.
This extinct volcano is considered the wettest spot on earth, with almost 500 inches of rainfall each year.
The performer’s fingers have to be slightly wet when playing it.

definition.en_def: Covered with, or saturated with liquid, especially water.
definition.example: The ground was wet after the rain.
